de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout

Class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.layout.AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractDragHandler.Callback, TabSwitcherLayout, Model.Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhoneTabSwitcherLayout

    public abstract class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements TabSwitcherLayout, Model.Listener, AbstractDragHandler.Callback
    An abstract base class for all layouts, which implement the functionality of a TabSwitcher.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AbstractTabSwitcherLayout.AnimationListenerWrapper
      A animation listener, which increases the number of running animations, when the observed animation is started, and decreases the number of accordingly, when the animation is finished.
      static interface  AbstractTabSwitcherLayout.Callback
      Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified about the events of a tab switcher layout, must implement.
      static class  AbstractTabSwitcherLayout.LayoutListenerWrapper
      A layout listener, which unregisters itself from the observed view, when invoked.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractTabSwitcherLayout(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, TabSwitcherModel model, Arithmetics arithmetics)
      Creates a new layout, which implements the functionality of a TabSwitcher.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractTabSwitcherLayout

        public AbstractTabSwitcherLayout(@NonNull
                                 TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                 @NonNull
                                 TabSwitcherModel model,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Arithmetics arithmetics)
        Creates a new layout, which implements the functionality of a TabSwitcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The tab switcher, the layout belongs to, as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The tab switcher may not be null
        model - The model of the tab switcher, the layout belongs to, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherModel. The model may not be null
        arithmetics - The arithmetics, which should be used by the layout, as an instance of the type Arithmetics. The arithmetics may not be null

      • onInflateLayout

        @Nullable
protected abstract AbstractDragHandler<?> onInflateLayout(boolean tabsOnly)
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to inflate the layout.
        Parameters:
        tabsOnly - True, if only the tabs should be inflated, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The drag handler, which is used by the layout, as an instance of the class AbstractDragHandler or null, if no drag handler is used

      • onDetachLayout

        @Nullable
protected abstract android.support.v4.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Float> onDetachLayout(boolean tabsOnly)
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to detach the layout.
        Parameters:
        tabsOnly - True, if only the tabs should be detached, false otherwise
        Returns:
        A pair, which contains the index of the first visible tab, as well as its current position, as an instance of the class Pair or null, if the tab switcher is not shown

        Handles a touch event.
        Parameters:
        event - The touch event as an instance of the class MotionEvent. The touch event may not be null
        Returns:
        True, if the event has been handled, false otherwise

        @Nullable
public final android.support.v4.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Float> detachLayout(boolean tabsOnly)
        Detaches the layout.
        Parameters:
        tabsOnly - True, if only the tabs should be detached, false otherwise
        Returns:

                    TabItem tabItem,
                    float distance)
        Description copied from interface: AbstractDragHandler.Callback
        The method, which is invoked, when a tab is swiped.
        Specified by:
        onSwipe in interface AbstractDragHandler.Callback

        tabItem - The tab item, which corresponds to the swiped tab, as an instance of the class TabItem. The tab item may not be null

      • onSwipeEnded

        public void onSwipeEnded(@NonNull
                         TabItem tabItem,
                         boolean remove,
                         float velocity)
        Description copied from interface: AbstractDragHandler.Callback
        The method, which is invoked, when swiping a tab ended.
        Specified by:
        onSwipeEnded in interface AbstractDragHandler.Callback
        Parameters:
        tabItem - The tab item, which corresponds to the swiped tab, as an instance of the class TabItem. The tab item may not be null
        remove - True, if the tab should be removed, false otherwise
        velocity - The velocity of the swipe gesture in pixels per second as a Float value
